text: So the relationship between AWS
and MUFG, we can go back
to about roughly 10 years.
And since 2016,

we declared the so-called
cloud-first strategy,
and then we started to shift the workload
and data into the cloud, of course in AWS.
And since then, we gradually started
to modernize our workload and what we did.
By leveraging the AWS Managed Services,

we can easily utilize the
latest technology, right.

If it's in the on-premise,
we needed to build everything

by ourselves, but once
it's lift to the cloud,

we can be leveraging
all AWS Managed Services

at the same time. When
it comes to Gen AI,

we are heavily using
Amazon Bedrock.

Previously, it took several
months to update the applications

or to present some materials
to corporate customers.
But when we use the cloud
and accelerated development life cycles,
we can just shorten the one week

or several days process into just
a few minutes.
AWS enables us to handle the data easily
and in building, shipping the AI

and ML model to every
employee very easily.
So that is the part, key part to us.

So by using AWS, we
can accelerate the time
to production, and in that way,

we can build much more
time for internal employees
to directly contact with our client,

and then that will definitely
improve our client experiences.
